abstract.text: An object that splits up a single render pass so that it can be simultaneously encoded from multiple threads.

inlineContent.text: Your app does not define classes that implement this protocol. To create a
object that you want to encode the rendering commands into. Then, call the renderCommandEncoder method on this
object to create one or more
objects created encode their commands to the same command buffer and target the same
object ensures the attachment load and store actions only occur at the start and end of the entire rendering pass.

to its own thread and each can encode commands in parallel. You are responsible for any thread synchronization that is required. After all the subordinate encoders have finished encoding their commands, call
to execute the commands. The rendering commands are executed in the order that the subordinate encoders were created.

abstract.text: Render advanced 3D graphics and compute data in parallel with graphics processors.
A container that stores a sequence of GPU commands that you encode into it.
Creates a parallel render command encoder from a descriptor.
An encoder that writes GPU commands into a command buffer.
Declares that all command generation from the encoder is completed.
Types of actions performed for an attachment at the start of a rendering pass.
An object that splits up a single render pass so that it can be simultaneously encoded from multiple threads.
Create an object that encodes commands that perform graphics rendering operations and may be assigned to a different thread.
Specifies a known store action to replace the initial
value specified for a given color attachment.
Specifies known store action options for a given color attachment.
Specifies a known store action to replace the initial
value specified for a given depth attachment.
Specifies known store action options for a given depth attachment.
Specifies a known store action to replace the initial
value specified for a given stencil attachment.
Specifies known store action options for a given stencil attachment.
An interface that encodes a render pass into a command buffer, including all its draw calls and configuration.
A render target that serves as the output destination for pixels generated by a render pass.
Types of actions performed for an attachment at the end of a rendering pass.
The app will specify the store action when it encodes the render pass.
Options that modify a store action.
The group of methods that are fundamental to all Objective-C objects.
